definitions: possession of a strong desire to be more successful than others

examples.text: a lot of people get wrapped up in competitiveness and jealousy

shortDefinitions: possession of strong desire to be more successful than others

definitions: the quality of being as good as or better than others of a comparable nature

examples.text: the competitiveness of the agricultural sector

shortDefinitions: quality of creating need to be as good as or better than others of comparable nature

definitions: the quality of comparing well with rival traders in terms of pricing

examples.text: shoppers are often pleasantly surprised by the competitiveness of the prices

shortDefinitions: quality of being priced low enough to compare well with rival traders
